about_the_game:
The Divine Era. A time when humanity started to prosper under the guidance of the gods. Feel the heat of Rahyeh as he begins his assault on the other gods with this pack. This Pack includes the Huloung Gate Portal, Moltuneplume Veneer back piece, and Divine YiQi collector’s pet.


Huloung Gate

The wilds of Eterra are treacherous, thankfully the Huloung Gate’s dragon beckons you towards the portal’s swirling flames and closer to Rahyeh’s radiance, an overture to the safety and comfort of the hearth to which you return.


Moltuneplume Veneer

Adorn yourself in the fiery plume of the Mountain God as you carry out his bidding. Your enemies shall tremble in Rahyeh’s luminance as fall to your might.


Divine YiQi

The Divine YiQi is part of Last Epoch’s newest collectible pet series. The YiQi is a fiercely loyal pet who has taken a particular liking to you Traveler, following you not only across Eterra, but on your journey through time as well. Choose your favorite era’s YiQi, or start your quest to collect them all.


150 Bonus Epoch Points

So you can purchase further customization options from our cosmetics shop.

*Please note that DLC Packages are not refundable, and if you purchased this DLC in-game, it may not appear in your Steam library. Please check before purchasing to ensure you have not already purchased this DLC.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content
